name: ax-c11
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w0)))
comment: Axiom ~ ax-c11 was the original version of ~ ax-c11n ("n" for "new"), before it was discovered (in May 2008) that the shorter ~ ax-c11n could replace it. It appears as Axiom scheme C11' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). This axiom is obsolete and should no longer be used. It is proved above as theorem ~ axc11 . (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1993.) (New usage is discouraged.)
